name: Wand of Fireballs
description: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast the Fireball spell (save DC 15) from it.

name: Ring of Protection
description: While wearing this ring, you gain a +1 bonus to AC and saving throws while you are attuned to it.

name: Potion of Healing
description: You regain 2d4+2 hit points when you drink this potion.

name: Scroll of Fireball
description: This scroll contains the Fireball spell.

name: Sword of Sharpness
description: When you attack an object with this magic sword and hit, maximize your weapon damage dice against the target.

name: Longbow of Accuracy
description: This longbow grants a +2 bonus to attack rolls made with it.

name: Armor of Invulnerability
description: While wearing this armor, you have resistance to nonmagical damage.

name: Scale Mail of Resistance
description: This scale mail grants resistance to a specific damage type.

name: Leather Armor of Stealth
description: This leather armor grants advantage on stealth checks.
